definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: daughter-in-law of Judah Ge 38:6, Ge 38:11, Ge 38:11, Ge 38:13, Ge 38:24, 1Ch 2:4, Ru 4:12.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: daughter of David, sister of Absalom 2Sa 13:1, 2Sa 13:2 + 11 t. 2Sa 13, 2Ch 3:9. †

definitions.title: 2. loc.
definitions.body: Ez Eze 47:19, Eze 48:28; 1Ki 9:18 Kt ( > Qr [[תַּדְמׂר]] q.v.), so read also ‖ 2Ch 8:4 (for MT [[תַּדְמׂר]]); site not certain, cf. Buhl:G 184.—[[בַּעַל תָּמָר]] v. [[בַּעַל]]. p. 128
